_xResult.title: Navy Floral Pencil Skirt
_xResult.shortdesc: Denim-look cotton chintz skirt, wear separate or with suit blazer
_xResult.longdesc:
Midi high waist floral skirt is an extremely feminine piece, ideal for both office and casual outfits.  Made of the same cotton chintz as the matching blazer, the navy blue and floral pattern will go with many different blouses and looks. 

  • Standard length 60cm (unless specified otherwise)
  • High waist slims and flatters
  • Closure with hidden zipper
  • Fully lined
  • Back slit

When ordering, please specify desired length (measure from your natural waist down to where you want the skirt to end, or if we have your waist-to-knee measurement on file, simply state whether you want it above, at or below knee).

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and dry clean only
